section.name: Webstart Demo
section.p: This page lets you start a demonstration program that shows some of the things you can with RichDock.

subsection.name: Get Java
subsection.p: You must have Java 5 or later installed in your web browser to run the demo application. If you don't have Java installed, you can download it for free by clicking the Get Java Software button.

subsection.name: Start Demo
subsection.p: If you have Java installed, click the launch button to start the demonstration application

subsection.name: Trademarks
subsection.p: Java is a trademark of Sun Microsystems, Inc.
